S

score - Variable in class Card
represents score of cards

SkipCard - Class in <Unnamed>
this is a subclass of ActionCard class and its duty is to skip one player
SkipCard(int, String, String) - Constructor for class SkipCard
it just initializes Card super class fields
skipPlayer() - Method in class GameLaunch
this method is used whenever we use a SkipCard and skips one player
